Title: Makes provisions regarding plans and specifications of school buildings with respect to health and safety, including environmental health and safety
Summary: Adds a list of items, including certain quality air conditioning systems, to the requirements for approval of new, leased or remodeled school buildings with respect to health and safety, including environmental health and safety; requires departments of health and environmental conservation to report to the education department and school districts information on environmental hazards relevant to school buildings.
LawCode: Amd §§408, 409-d & 409-e, Ed L; add §3-0320, En Con L; add §201-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, the environmental conservation law and the public health law, in relation to plans and specifications of school buildings
